IndicatorsGeneral.FeedbackText: Let's take a look at how you did for the indicators...

Good try. You didn't find any of the indicators and chose the wrong indicators, but we'll have a look at where you went wrong.

ResponsesGeneral.FeedbackText: Let's take a look at how you did for your response...
Congratulations! Your chosen response was correct!
Your chosen response was incorrect, but that's ok! We'll have a look at why and what response would have been most appropriate

ResponsesSpecific.FeedbackText: You chose to reply to the email, which was acceptable given the email's contents. However, always proceed with caution.
You chose to reply to the email. This is the wrong response, since it puts you and your information at risk.
An email reply would have acceptable for this email
You chose to reply to delete the email, which is a good decision given the email's contents.
You chose to delete the email. This is the wrong response, since the email was not harmful
Deleting the email would have been a suitable response
You chose to reply to report the email, which is a is a fantastic decision given the email's contents. Well done!
You chose to report the email, which was not required since the email was not harmful
Reporting the email would have been the best response
You opened the link from this email. This was technically ok, but its always best to avoid opening email links wherever possible
You chose to open the link, where the email was a phishing attack. Be careful of these pesky links
